original_text: Someone might light a fire in his field to burn thorn bushes. But the fire might grow and it might burn the crops in another farmer's field. It may destroy the crops that are growing there or the grain that is ready for harvest. It might even destroy the whole field. Then the person who lit the fire must pay the farmer for the crops that the fire has destroyed.
korean_text: 불이 나서 가시나무에 댕겨 낟가리나 거두지 못한 곡식이나 밭을 태우면 불 놓은 자가 반드시 배상할지니라

sentences.original_text: Someone might light a fire in his field
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람이 자기 밭에 불을 지필 수 있고

sentences.original_text: and it might burn the crops in another farmer's field
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 농부의 밭에 있는 곡식을 태울 수 있다

sentences.original_text: It may destroy the crops that are growing there
sentences.korean_translation: 그곳에서 자라는 작물을 파괴할 수 있고

sentences.original_text: or the grain that is ready for harvest
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 수확할 준비가 된 곡식을 파괴할 수 있다

sentences.original_text: It might even destroy the whole field
sentences.korean_translation: 심지어 전체 밭을 파괴할 수도 있다

sentences.original_text: Then the person who lit the fire must pay the farmer
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 불을 지른 사람이 농부에게 배상해야 한다

sentences.original_text: for the crops that the fire has destroyed
